text.section: Except for the powers conferred by KRS 227.220(3)(a), the rights, powers and privileges granted under this chapter to the state fire marshal shall not apply to any single family dwelling in this Commonwealth.

Any city, county or urban-county government of the Commonwealth may extend, by ordinance, the application of this chapter to those single family dwellings exempted under subsection (1) of this section.

law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 305, sec. 25, effective June 17, 1978.
